title: Modification of the employee file (used for sorting) in batch
content: For more information on the sort order and its functions, click here. Click on the Employee menu,Choose Modify Employee Sorting Order (batch),Select the employees: by the enterprise, OR by service/department OR by position,Click on Search,Check the employees concerned,Double-click on the Employee's file box to modify,Click on Save.To check the information, and change individually:  Go to the Employee file,In the Parameters section, click on Work Parameters.Helpful?00Updated: 2 years ago Share :
